title: Gravina: 'Resume for Italy's sake'

content:
FIGC chief Gabriele Gravina has claimed that those who want Serie A to end now “don’t like football or Italians”.
Gravina has been vocal in his desire for the season to resume, with cases of COVID-19 having peaked in Italy, and he is now pushing for a start … [+1399 chars]
